name: DummyAPI
body:
### Preface

There is time when you need just simple mock backend for your web application or experiment. That's why I've developed DummyAPI. 

### Features

1. REST-like interface 
1. Socket.IO notifications (TBD)
1. Proxy functions for data transformations before sending to client
1. Mock authentication with users and user groups
1. Custom resource routes 
1. ...

### Contributors
You are welcome to become one.

### Support or Contact
24/7, just call me J. 
Seriously, any remarks, thought, found bugs, etc are all very valuable for me.
